name: Torn’s Peaker
details:
fuzz with ALL the flawsThe Torn’s Peaker is fuzz LOVE.. this is fuzz with ALL the flaws.. all the little grime and compression and unclean, ungodly, unholy sounds that distorted wave forms originated from!!! Sliced up speaker cones… over-driven pre-amps on mixing boards of the 50′s… sessions recorded directly to vinyl before the days of tape and processors and protools.
https://deviever.net/collections/frontpage/products/devi-ever-fx-torns-peaker
